Welcome to nutriotion-assistant’s documentation!¶

NutriotionProject main¶

Module with main app.

class app.CurrentMenu¶

Class for current menu.

set_men(menu)¶

Set current menu to given one.

app.add_cals()¶

Add nutrients from products.

app.add_cals1()¶

Add nutrients to daily intake for products.

app.all_of_them()¶

Return page with all products with given name from API.

app.backup_user(login, password, height, weight, age, gender, activity, current_menu)¶

Write info about user in file.

app.calc_last()¶

Add nutrients for all menu.

app.file_html()¶

To return already submitted page

app.generate_menu_page()¶

This route is used to calculated parameters and then create menu, which is then attached to user instance (new attribute). Clicking “Generate” button on base.html page redirects to this route. If no username in session, redirects to home page

app.get_backuped_users()¶

Get users from database.

app.get_menu_page()¶

This route renders base.html page with menu if it is generated or with single button to generate menu otherwise (watch base.html on the bottom) This route can not be accessed without being logged in, so sample page will be rendered if there is no username in session

app.home()¶

Home page.

app.login()¶

This is post request to home page.

app.logout()¶

Logout user from session.

app.menuuuu()¶

Return page for optional menu.

app.profile()¶

Return profile page.

app.profile_update()¶

This route changes user profile

app.register_page()¶

Return register page.

NutriotionProject calculator¶

Module for calculator.

class modules.calculator.Calculator(weight: float, height: float, age: int, sex: str, activity: float)¶

Class for calculator.

calories_need() → float¶

Return the daily amount of calories to this user (in kcal).

carbohydrates_need()¶

Return the daily amount of carbohydrates to this user (in grams).

fats_need()¶

Return the daily amount of fats to this user (in grams).

proteins_need()¶

Return the daily amount of proteins to this user (in grams).

NutriotionProject dish¶

Module for implementing class dish.

class modules.dish.Dish(name: str, instruction: str, products: str, calories: float, proteins: float, fats: float, carbohydrates: float)¶

Class for dishes.

NutriotionProject menu¶

Module for implementing menu class.

class modules.menu.Menu(calories: float, proteins: float, fats: float, carbohydrates: float, preferences: list)¶

Class for menu.

accept_dish(dish: modules.dish.Dish)¶

User aceepts dish, we substitute his/her daily intake of nutrients by this dish.

choose_dishes()¶

Search for the dishes which user will eat. Return list of these dishes.

delete_dish(dish: modules.dish.Dish)¶

User refuses to eat this dish, we change it.

generate_dish()¶

Add new dish to the menu if user wanted to change the current one. !Prerequirements: this method generates the third meal, two others stay.

generate_menu()¶

Generates menu which consists of 3 different dishes to the user.

search_product(product_name: str, weight)¶

Search for the product in database.

NutriotionProject product¶

Module for implementing product class.

class modules.product.Product(name: str)¶

Class for product.

choose_product(exact_name: str, weight: float)¶

Return the info about nutrients (as a tuple in order calories-lipids-fats -carbohydrates) in this exact product. Weight should be in grams!

get_products()¶

Return the list of the names of the products which API found by users ask.

NutriotionProject user_db¶

UserDB class

exception modules.user_db.UserAlreadyExists(usr_login)¶

Raises when trying to add existing user or user with the same login

class modules.user_db.UserDB¶

User DataBase class

add(user: modules.user_work.User)¶

Adds a User to database

If user with the same login is already in UserDB, UserAlreadyExists exceptoin will be raised

clear()¶

Removes all users from database

get(usr_login: str) → modules.user_work.User¶

Returns User object for usr_login if user with usr_login is in UserDB. Otherwise raises UserNotFound exception

pop(usr_login)¶

Removes a user from database. usr_login - user login as str OR object of type User

If usr_login is represented as object of type User, usr.login will be extracted and used to find and delete the user from self.users

In case user with user_id is not found, UserNotFound exception will be raised

exception modules.user_db.UserNotFound(usr_login)¶

Raises when trying to access user which is not in UserDB
